name: Romantic, Delicate Fine Layered Sterling Silver Layered Chain Necklace AC0821-SS by Ashley Childs
description:
Long and layered, hangs 16 inches to 20.5 inches. 10 layers of super fine sterling silver chain. spring clasp and stamped "ashley childs" artist tag on clasp. Modern, classic, simple, elegant, striking, romantic and delicate. Feminine in every way! *All designs © copyright of Ashley Childs, § 1301. name: the "Fearless Warrior" Long Fine Sterling Silver Chain Fringe Necklace AC0897 by Ashley Childs
description:
the "Fearless Warrior" Long Fine Sterling Silver Chain Fringe Necklace AC0897 by Ashley Childs Fine graduated layered sterling silver chain, necklace fringe is 5 inches in length at longest point, small lobster clasp, full necklace length measures 20 inches in length. Clasp stamped 'AshleyChilds' The super-fine graduated layers of chain is sensual to the touch, elegant for a night out on the town, exquisite and head-turning! Serious fringe this piece - watch out!! *All designs © copyright of Ashley Childs, § 1301. Designs protected* View Ashley Childs' full collections gallery at www.ashleychilds.com

name: Fine Sterling Silver, Delicate Chain Fringe Pendant Necklace, 16" & 18", AC0895
description:
Fine Sterling Silver, Delicate Chain Fringe Pendant Necklace, 16" & 18", AC0895 From the fearless fringe and layers series, fine Sterling Silver chain layered pendant necklace, 18 or 16 inches in length. chain-pendant measures 2.5 inches long, Spring clasp. name: the "Emma" earrings, 14ktgf Gold Chain Fearless Fringe Layered Earrings AC0721
description:
named: the "Emma" earrings Delicate fine layers of 14kt gold filled chain, fringed, dangling and layered. Ear wires are 14kt gold-filled. Lengths available: 2.5", 3", 3.5", 4", for other lengths besides those listed, please contact Ashley Childs. Add the perfect subtle flare to your ensemble or a touch of sexy in the office. These are the perfect, go-to earrings, wear with anything, wear anywhere. Sexy, sultry, minimalistic, casual yet elegant.
